title: Commission Directive 85/413/EEC of 24 July 1985 amending Directive 80/723/EEC on the transparency of financial relations between Member States and public undertakings
header:
COMMISSION  DIRECTIVE
of 24 July 1985
amending Directive 80/723/EEC on the transparency of financial relations between Member States and public undertakings
(85/413/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: Member States shall take the necessary measures to comply with this Directive by 1 January 1986. They shall inform the Commission thereof.
This Directive is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 July 1985.
For the Commission
Peter SUTHERLAND
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 195, 29. 7. 1980, p. 35.
